The PhD news: Year four is underway. I’m currently recruiting for an interview/data collection study involving money behaviors and bipolar disorder. We’re aiming to design personalized, privacy-preserving, supportive financial technologies tailored to this illness.

I’ll be traveling to Japan for CHI 2025 where I’m co-organizing a workshop The Future of Money and HCI.

I’m really enjoying reading Ways of Seeing by John Berger. I’m also excited for All Media is Training Data by Holly Herndon & Mat Dryhurst.
